reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product was exactly as described. Fast delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Value. Comfortable. Decent Sound
reviews.reviewText: My son, who has some sensory issues sometimes, found these headphones preferable over a retro 80’s Starlord cosplay set . They aren’t too tight, but they fit snugly and comfortably up against the ear. The sound output is a little less than he prefers, but he still likes them and uses them at home and at school.The other 23 headsets I will be using as backup headphones for my kindergarten class. It seems every week there’s at least one student who forgets their headphones or has them short out, so these will be a nice backup set. While I cannot yet comment on the longevity of the product, so far they have worked well for nearly a month without any issues. Besides, at a little more than $1 per pair, even if a few of them short out or break down, it will still be worth the price of the set. Overall, I’d recommend these headphones especially for classroom use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Students
reviews.reviewText: These headphones are great for students and computer classrooms or just as a regular classroom set. The sound quality is good and they come in individually bags. These are a great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for a classroom
reviews.reviewText: I love that you can get some many but a student broke a pair the first day. The wiring came out of the plug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for classroom use
reviews.reviewText: I needed some headphones for my classroom for students to use. These work great! This lets students listen to videos or other things with audio in private, without overwhelming the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars They Break Easily
reviews.reviewText: I purchased for my 2/3 combo class. The cord comes off from the ear pieces easily. In face, the cap on the ear piece falls off. The cheaper ones I purchased last year are still working. These started breaking within a day. Not for a classroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and cheerful class pack of headphones. Perfect for classroom use, and cheap!
reviews.reviewText: 24 Packs Headphones Bulk for Kids Classrooms Set School Students Class Wired On-Ear Over-Ear Earphones Individually BaggedThese are cheap, lightweight headphones similar to what you'd get on an airplane. They're nothing fancy, but they do the job when you need a wired headphone. We got these for my daughter's elementary school, where children always need headphones. Both the teacher and students have been happy with them. They came just in time for a big semester standardized test day, and several children who had lost or broken headphones really appreciated them. I'd say these are a great classroom/school donation, as there are always going to be children in need of headphones, either for financial reasons, technology problems, or just the standard kiddo absent-mindedness. I've been using a pair myself recently because the speaker on my laptop has been blown out. The sound quality isn't exactly high fidelity, but it's nice and clear, definitely good for voice and certainly adequate for music. I like that they're simple, cheap, and wired, so no batteries to charge and no tragedy if the get broken or misplaced, perfect for schools. The fit is fine for both me and my daughter, and there's a wide headband where you can write the child's name, and the plastic section over the ear foams is large enough that kids can decorate them with small stickers if they like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, but get the job done
reviews.reviewText: I work at a space ship simulator, and we have training videos for each crew member to learn their stations. We go through headphones fairly often, as a result, since the headphones are used multiple times a day. We've, traditionally, gotten more expensive, over the ear headphones that we've found don't seem to last long, so we've started opting for cheaper headphones like this.Due to the size, of course, they come in a fairly small box. Each pair is individually wrapped in a little polybag. They're pretty standard headphones that you'd see of this variety otherwise. The length of the cable is decent, at about 4 feet. Since we only utilize these for voice training, and not music, they are more than sufficient for our needs. Hopefully they last as long as our others, which we are hoping, but since they are far cheaper, it's a much better value for us.
